A while ago, a website talked about the dangers of public check-ins. Public check-ins are when you tell people online where you are. The website said that when you say, "I am at this place," you are also telling many people where you are. Some of these people may not be good to meet. This shows that sharing everything online can have problems. 
The internet gives us many chances to share our lives. We can share our stories, photos, and feelings. But sometimes, we can get lost in this sharing. It can be scary. However, we should not give up. There are lessons from people who used the internet a long time ago. 
In January 1994, a 19-year-old student named Justin Hall started sharing his life online. At that time, the internet was mostly for students and scientists. Hall wanted to share his life, so he created a blog. He wrote about everything and shared many photos. People liked to read his blog because he was brave and shared many things. 
One day, people went to his blog and saw a sad video instead of his usual posts. Hall had fallen in love, but when he wrote about it, he was told to stop or lose his relationship. He felt that sharing his life online made people not trust him. 
In 2002, a woman named Heather Armstrong had a blog called Dooce. She sometimes wrote about her job. One day, a coworker sent her blog link to her bosses, and she lost her job. This shows that what we say online can have real-life consequences. 
Armstrong was sad and stopped blogging for a while, but later she got married and started a new blog about her family. Now, she is very popular and makes money from her writing. She learned that while we can say anything online, we should think carefully before we do. 
**Questions:**
1. What is a public check-in?
2. Who is Justin Hall?
3. What happened to Justin Hall when he wrote about his love?
4. What is the name of Heather Armstrong's blog?
5. What lesson did Heather Armstrong learn?

Some scientists wanted to warn people about a low-budget movie called *What the Bleep Do We Know?* This movie mixes real information and stories to show that we do not understand a lot about our universe. Some scientists thought the movie was very bad and even dangerous. 
At first, I did not understand why the movie was so important. Some scientists talked about new discoveries that show the universe is very strange. Then, the movie talked about how water can be changed by thoughts. I heard that a Japanese researcher showed that water can change shape based on how people feel. The movie showed nice pictures of ice crystals that looked good when people were happy and looked bad when people were angry. 
Many people think this is interesting, but scientists want more proof. They want real evidence, not just pretty pictures. The movie's claims were not strange enough. Scientists say that water has energy that comes from nowhere and is connected to a force that makes the universe grow. This idea is based on many years of research, not just a few pictures.
Scientists have found that the universe is made of a type of matter we do not know about, and it is pushed by something called "dark energy." Other discoveries are also surprising. Scientists found that our brains take about half a second to understand what happens around us. They also think they know where modern humans first lived and how they spread around the world. Some scientists believe there is a link between life on Earth and the design of the universe.
Science is always changing and growing. We are learning that many things in nature are more complicated than we thought. Some scientists are trying to create a "Theory of Everything" to explain all the forces and particles in the universe. But many of us think the universe is best described with one word: incredible.
**Questions:**
1. What is the name of the movie that some scientists warned people about?
2. What do scientists think about the idea that water can be changed by thoughts?
3. What do scientists want instead of pretty pictures?
4. What is "dark energy"?
5. What do some scientists believe about the first modern humans?

"Writing novels is hard for me, but writing short stories is fun. Writing a novel is like planting a big forest. Writing a short story is like planting a small garden. Both are important to me. The trees in the forest give shade, and the leaves move in the wind. In the garden, flowers bloom, and their colors attract bees and butterflies. 
Since I started writing, I have often switched between novels and short stories. When I finish a novel, I want to write short stories. When I finish short stories, I want to write a novel. I do not write short stories when I am writing a novel, and I do not write a novel when I am writing short stories. 
I began my writing career with two short novels in 1975. From 1984 to 1985, I started writing short stories. I did not know much about writing short stories then, but it was a great experience. One of my first short stories, 'Breaking Waves', was in my first collection called Tales from Abroad. 
One good thing about short stories is that they do not take long to finish. It usually takes me about a week to write a short story. Writing a novel takes a year or two, and it can feel very long. Writing short stories is a nice change for me. 
Another good thing is that you can create a story from small ideas, like a word or an image. Writing a short story is like playing jazz music; the story goes where it wants. If a short story does not work out, it is okay. Not every story has to be perfect. Even famous writers like F. Scott Fitzgerald and Raymond Carver have stories that are not great. 
I learn from my mistakes in short stories and use that to help me write novels. Short stories help me try new things. They are like small memories I have shared with the world. I remember how I felt when I wrote each one. Short stories show my feelings, and I am happy to share them with my readers."

Science is a way to understand the world. It helps us in many ways, like curing diseases, but it can also create problems. Science tries to explain everything, from tiny atoms to the universe. It has influenced many people, including poets and leaders. Sometimes, people do not understand science well, and they may think it is more important or less important than it really is. 
Science changes all the time. New ideas can replace old ones. For example, in the past, people thought the universe was like a big clock. Now, scientists have new ideas that change how we see the universe. Some people think that science cannot explain everything, but new discoveries help us understand more about nature.
Famous scientists like Isaac Newton and Albert Einstein have helped us learn a lot. Science has made many discoveries, like radioactivity and the electron. Today, some people believe we will find a complete explanation of the universe soon.
Science is important for everyone. It affects our lives and the future of our planet. We need to understand science because it helps us make decisions that can change our world and our children's lives.

Since about 2015, big book publishers have said that sales of ebooks are not growing as much as before. Some publishers even think that they invested too much in ebooks and lost faith in printed books. People still ask if ebooks will replace printed books. This question makes us think and talk a lot. Why do we think ebooks and printed books are in a fight? The answers show how we feel about new things and changes in our lives.
In my research, I found that when new technology comes, people often say it will end older technology. For example, when television was invented, many people thought radio would disappear. But radio found new ways to be used, like in cars and factories. The idea that books might disappear is not new. In 1894, some people thought that phonographs would replace books with audiobooks.
Many times, people have said that new things like movies, radio, and smartphones would end printed books. Some people worried that this would be bad for culture. Others thought ebooks would be much better. The idea that books might die comes up when new technology appears. This shows our hopes and fears about change.
We feel strong connections to things like books and computers. We even name our cars or get upset when our laptops don’t work. When new technology, like e-readers, comes, it changes our relationship with things we love. We often miss what we used to have. This is why some people still want old products. For example, when the printing press was made in the 15th century, people wanted original manuscripts. When movies changed from silent to sound, people missed silent films. The same happened with photography and music.
E-readers have made people appreciate printed books more, even their smell. This should make people feel better about printed books not disappearing. But the idea that something might disappear will always be interesting. It shows both our excitement for new things and our fear of losing what we love. We often tell stories about change that are easy to remember, like stories of loss. The story of the death of the book reflects our hopes for the future and our fear of losing parts of our lives. 
**Questions:**
1. What have big book publishers said about ebook sales since 2015?
2. Why do people think ebooks and printed books are in a fight?
3. What did people think would happen to radio when television was invented?
4. What did some people think would happen to books when phonographs were made?
5. How do e-readers make people feel about printed books?

Every weekday morning for a year and a half, I woke up at 5:30. I brushed my teeth, made coffee, and sat down to write. I wrote about how great thinkers from the last four hundred years did their best work. I wanted to show how they organized their time to be creative and productive. I wrote about their daily lives – when they slept, ate, worked, and worried. I hoped to show their personalities and careers in a fun way. 
A French writer, Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin, said, “Tell me what you eat, and I shall tell you what you are.” I say, “Tell me what time you eat, and if you take a nap.” This book is about how people create, not just what they create. It is also personal. The writer John Cheever said that you show something about yourself when you write. 
I have questions in this book that I think about in my own life: How do you do creative work and also earn money? Is it better to work on one project or a little bit each day? When there is not enough time, do you give things up, like sleep or a clean house? Or can you learn to do more in less time? 
I do not have all the answers, but I want to show how many successful people faced the same problems. I wanted to show how big ideas become small daily actions and how working habits affect the work. The book is called Daily Rituals, but it is really about people’s routines. A routine can seem boring, but it can help you use your time well. 
The psychologist William James said that good habits can help us focus on important things. Ironically, he was a procrastinator and could not keep a regular schedule. 
One Sunday, I was at my job, trying to write a story. Instead of working, I was cleaning my desk and making coffee. I am a morning person and can focus well in the morning, but I am not good after lunch. That afternoon, I started looking online for information about other writers’ schedules. I thought it would be good to collect these stories, so I started a blog called Daily Routines. 
In the blog, I shared people’s routines from biographies and articles. For this book, I gathered more information and tried to keep it interesting. I let my subjects speak for themselves with quotes from their letters and diaries. I also summarized their routines from other sources. 
This book would not be possible without the work of many biographers and journalists. I have listed all my sources in the Notes section for more reading.

Howard wanted to be a palaeontologist when he was six years old. His father was worried about money and said they could not go on holiday to Spain. Instead, they went to a beach in England. On a rainy day, Howard found an ammonite shell on the beach. He always wanted to study old creatures. At university, he decided what kind of palaeontologist he wanted to be. He liked studying the very beginning of life, not dinosaurs.
After finishing his studies, Howard was worried about getting a job. He felt good about his skills, but he knew that sometimes good people do not get jobs. When a job opened at Tavistock College in London, he applied, but he did not expect much.
On the day of his interview, the professor who was supposed to help him had a fight with his wife. He was upset and had an accident, so he could not come to the interview. Another professor, who did not like the first one, took his place. This professor helped Howard get the job. Howard was surprised but happy to have the job.
Howard liked his work because he could plan and do his research. But sometimes, things in his personal life were chaotic. One day, someone stole his briefcase with his lecture notes at a train station. He was very angry and went back to the college. He called to postpone his lecture and reported the theft. After that, he had coffee with a colleague who was with a visitor from the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. 
Howard learned about a new collection of fossils that he could study. This would be a big challenge for him and help his career. Because of the theft, he changed his plans. He decided not to go to a conference in Stockholm or take students to Scotland. Instead, he would find money to visit the museum in Nairobi. 
**Questions:**
1. Why did Howard want to be a palaeontologist?
2. What happened to Howard's holiday plans?
3. How did Howard feel about getting a job after university?
4. What happened to the professor on the day of Howard's interview?
5. What did Howard learn about at the coffee meeting?

Charles Spence eats many different foods. He says, "We have ice cream made from bee larvae at home." The larvae look like maggots, but they taste a little nutty and floral. Spence is a professor at Oxford University in the UK. He studies how our senses work together to help us taste food. He wants to make eating bugs more acceptable. 
Spence's work affects what we eat and drink. He helps big food companies and restaurants with their menus. He studies how we experience food. For example, who we eat with, how food looks, and even background noise can change how food tastes. 
In his book, *The Perfect Meal*, Spence shares interesting facts about food. Did you know that the first person to order food in a restaurant usually enjoys it more? And when we eat with one other person, we eat about 35% more food. If we eat with three people, we eat 75% more!
Spence's lab is simple. He has soundproof booths and old audio equipment. This helps him work with cooks who do not have much money for research. Many of his projects are funded by a big food company. 
Spence helps food companies reduce salt and sugar in their products. This is important because it helps customers stay healthy. Many companies make these changes slowly so that people do not notice. Spence says that if people know about the changes, they may not like the food as much.
Spence met famous chef Heston Blumenthal while working on a food project. They worked together to create a dish called "Sound of the Sea." Spence studies how sounds can change the taste of food. For example, high music can make food taste sweeter, while low music can make it taste bitter. 
Soon, an airline will match music with the food they serve. Last year, a brand made an app that played music while your ice cream melts, but they did not match the music to the taste.
What are dinner parties like at Spence's home? One time, they ate rabbit with the fur on the cutlery. Another time, they used remote-controlled lights. They even had a dinner party with headphones and different drinks to see how they tasted with different sounds. For Spence, home and food events are all part of his research. 
**Questions:**
1. What unusual ice cream does Charles Spence have at home?
2. What does Spence study at Oxford University?
3. How much more food do we eat when we are with one other person?
4. What is the name of Spence's book?
5. Who is Heston Blumenthal?

Our brains are very busy today. We get a lot of information, like facts, rumors, and opinions. We have to find what is important and what we can ignore. We are also doing more things than before. Thirty years ago, travel agents helped us book flights, and salespeople helped us in stores. Now, we do many things by ourselves. We are trying to do the work of many people while also taking care of our lives, families, jobs, hobbies, and favorite TV shows. Our smartphones help us with all this. 
But there is a problem. We think we can do many things at once, but this is not true. Earl Miller, a scientist at MIT, says our brains are not good at multitasking. When we think we are multitasking, we are really just switching quickly from one task to another. This can make us less efficient. Multitasking can also increase stress in our brains, making it hard to think clearly. 
The part of our brain that helps us focus can easily get distracted by new things. This makes it hard to stay on task. Just trying to multitask can hurt our ability to think well. Glenn Wilson, a psychology professor, found that trying to focus while seeing unread emails can lower our IQ by almost 10 points. 
Russ Poldrack, another scientist, found that learning while multitasking can send information to the wrong part of the brain. For example, if students do homework while watching TV, they do not remember the information as well. Without distractions, they can remember better. 
Multitasking also means we have to make many small decisions, like whether to answer a text message. Making decisions can be hard for our brains. After making many small decisions, we can make bad choices about important things. 
Many people talk about email as a problem. It is not that email is bad, but the large amount of emails we get is overwhelming. When a 10-year-old boy was asked what his father does, he said, "He answers emails." His father agreed that this is true. We feel we must reply to emails, but it is hard to do that and get other things done. 
**Questions:**
1. What do we get a lot of today that makes our brains busy?
2. Who helped us book flights thirty years ago?
3. What do smartphones help us with?
4. What does Earl Miller say about multitasking?
5. What can happen to our IQ when we try to focus on tasks with unread emails?
6. What happens to information when students do homework and watch TV at the same time?
7. What is a problem with making many small decisions? 
8. What did the 10-year-old boy say about his father’s job?

In a zoo in Sweden, a chimpanzee named Santino broke concrete at night. He did this to throw pieces at visitors during the day. Was he being mean? In caves in the US, female bats help other fruit bat mothers if they cannot give birth properly. Are they being kind? Fifty years ago, people did not think much about these questions. Animals acted in certain ways, and scientists studied these actions. They did not believe that animals had feelings or thoughts. But now, this idea is changing. Research on bats, chimps, rats, dolphins, and chickens shows that animals have emotions. This has led to books like Mark Bekoff’s "Wild Justice" and Victoria Braithwaite’s "Do Fish Feel Pain?". 
This change has started a big question: do animals have thoughts like humans? This question leads to another one: do animals have a sense of right and wrong? In a recent study with cows, those that opened a locked gate for food seemed happier than those that had help. If cows enjoy solving problems, what does this mean for eating beef? People agree on what they see, but they do not agree on what it means. Dr. Jonathan Balcombe, who wrote "Second Nature," believes we should stop eating meat. He thinks this is a big change in how we think about ethics. Aubrey Manning, a professor, believes we should think again about how animals think. He says animals might have a simpler way of thinking than humans. Professor Euan MacPhail thinks we should not put human feelings on animals. 
These ideas may never agree because the main issue is not just science or morals, but philosophy. It is hard to define what consciousness is. Can we ever know what it is like to be a bat? Balcombe did an important study that suggests starlings, a type of bird, can feel sad. In a study at Newcastle University, starlings were put into two groups. One group had nice cages with space and water. The other group had small, empty cages. Both groups learned to eat tasty worms from one box and not to eat bad worms from another box. But when only bad worms were given, only the starlings in nice cages would eat. Balcombe thinks that being in a bad cage made the starlings feel negative about life. 
Balcombe, who works with animal rights groups, has strong opinions. He says, “We look back and feel bad about racism. One day, we will feel the same about how we treat animals.” If he were the only one with this view, it might be easy to ignore him. But Professor Aubrey Manning agrees with him. Manning wrote a book called "An Introduction to Animal Behaviour." He says, “We are changing how we think about animals. In the past, some people thought animals thought like us, but now we are seeing things differently. This is a complicated topic, and we should listen carefully to different opinions.”

Critical thinking is a way to understand better what we read or hear. Adrian West, a researcher, says that arguing can help us find the truth. Technology helps us store information, but it can also make it hard to think deeply about problems. West mentions that we see a lot of poor thinking and opinions that can confuse us. More information does not always mean we make better decisions. 
Reading books has gone down a lot, and this may hurt our critical thinking skills. Patricia Greenfield, a professor, believes that focusing more on videos and fast media makes it harder to think about one thing deeply. We do not yet know exactly how technology affects our thinking. 
Technology can be both good and bad. For example, a computer game can help us think better or make it harder to think. Reading online can help us analyze information, but clicking on many links can distract us. Greenfield studied how technology changes our thinking. She says reading helps us think and use our imagination more than video games or TV. However, some visual media can help us process information quickly. 
Many young people do not reach their full potential because they do not spend enough time thinking deeply. How we see technology affects how we think critically. James Paul Gee, a professor, says that video games are not always bad for kids. They can be fun and also help us learn. Some games teach us to make decisions and think critically in a way that feels real. 
In today’s world, as reading and math scores go down, we need to understand how technology affects our thinking.

Matthew Crawford is a motorcycle mechanic. He used to work in an office but did not like it. He writes about how we should live. His first book talks about the good things about working with our hands. His latest book is about how to deal with modern life. 
One day, while shopping, he saw ads on a credit card machine while he was entering his pin number. He realized that these ads make it hard for us to focus. We often cannot think about what we want because of distractions. It is harder to remember conversations. People do not want to talk to strangers anymore because they are always interrupted. 
Crawford says we see the world through things like video games and apps. These things show us what we want but can take over our lives. Many office workers complain about emails but still check them in their free time. Studies show that just seeing a phone can make it hard to pay attention. 
Crawford believes that technology makes us more self-focused. We have many choices, which makes it hard to control ourselves. We often prefer to text friends instead of talking to them. He thinks that by only using screens, we lose real connections with people. 
He gives an example of a gym. In the past, there was one music player for everyone. Now, people listen to their own music with ear buds. The gym used to be a place to meet others, but now it is not. 
Crawford has two ideas to help. First, we need to reduce noise and distractions in public places. Second, he believes we should practice skills that help us connect with the real world. For example, cooks, hockey players, and motorcycle racers deal with real things. They use their judgment and work with others. 
Crawford says that when we engage with the real world, we see that fake experiences are not as good. It is important to find ways to use our judgment. This can help us focus better and enjoy life more.

"What do you do for a living?" This is a common question. People often talk about their jobs. But if you are a philosopher, it can be a little different. Saying "I am a philosopher" can sound strange. It can seem like you think you know more than others. But this is not true. Philosophers are just like everyone else.
Philosophers often think about life and how we live. A famous philosopher named Aristotle said that thinking about life is very important. He believed that a thoughtful life is the best kind of life. Another philosopher, Socrates, said that a life without thinking is not worth living. This means that we should think about our lives and the choices we make.
Thinking about our lives does not mean we need to read many difficult books. It just means we should look closely at our daily experiences. We do not need to be alone to think about life. In fact, thinking about life can help us make better choices. 
However, many people think philosophers are far away from real life. This is partly because philosophy has become a job that is hard to understand. Philosophers often write for other philosophers, not for everyone. This makes it hard for people to see how philosophy relates to their lives.
I often call myself an "ethicist" because I study ethics, which is about what is right and wrong. Ethics is important because it helps us think about our actions. For example, we might ask if downloading movies illegally is wrong. This is an important question. But philosophy is more than just ethics. It helps us think about many things in our lives.
By thinking about our actions and beliefs, we can learn more about ourselves. Sometimes we find out we already know something. Other times, we may realize our beliefs are not easy to explain. Either way, thinking about these ideas can help everyone.

People who love food, like foodies and chefs, think that thinking about what we eat can make eating more enjoyable. In the past, when philosophers talked about food, they often used it to explain other ideas, like learning. Sometimes, it seems like they are talking about food, but they are really discussing other topics. 
One famous philosopher, Epicurus, believed in seeking pleasure and avoiding pain in many parts of life. His name is now often connected to enjoying food and drink. Many restaurants and food shops use his name because they think it will attract customers. Food is not just about eating; it is also about sharing with others. The food we eat comes from history and is part of our communities. These communities help us grow and share food. 
When food is ready, critics talk and write about it. Some people wonder why food critics are important. One philosopher said that tasting food is not a special skill; good critics just describe food better. Most studies about how we sense things focus on sight, not taste, and this should change. 
Another important part of food is beauty. We say paintings and music are beautiful, but we don’t often say this about food. Some philosophers think that, because of modern cooking, food should be considered beautiful like art. However, food is eaten and gone, while art stays. 
There are also many questions about what we should eat. Should we eat organic food, free-range meat, or vegetarian meals? Our choices show our beliefs about what is right or wrong. Philosophers like to ask why we make these choices, and this is important to discuss. 
Cooking at home is different from cooking in restaurants. Home cooks have a special duty to their friends and family. When we cook at home, everyone shares food and time together. But restaurant cooks work for their boss and have different responsibilities. Their kitchens are not open to everyone, and they work with colleagues, not friends. 
A recent essay called "Diplomacy of the Dish" talks about how food can help people from different cultures connect. We can learn to enjoy other people's food and build friendships by eating together. This idea has a long history in international relations. The essay includes many interesting stories that make food philosophy exciting for everyone.

Rob Daviau is from the US. He makes special board games called ‘legacy’ games. When he was a child, he played board games, but he thought they were not fun or challenging anymore. He wanted to make board games better. He asked, “Can board games have a story? Can choices in one game affect the next game?” 
He changed a classic game called Risk and made a new version called Risk Legacy. In this game, choices made by players change the game forever. Players might have to tear up cards, change the board, or open new packets with new rules. The game is played over several sessions, and players remember their past actions. Daviau said, “You can point to the board and say: ‘You did this!’”
Then, he worked on a legacy version of Pandemic, a popular game where players try to cure diseases. His next game was called SeaFall. Pandemic Legacy was very popular, but SeaFall was a big test because it was a new game. In SeaFall, players are sailors exploring a new world.
Designers of legacy games must think about all the choices players can make. They need testers to see how the game works. Jaime Barriga was a tester for SeaFall. He said, “It takes a lot of time. Sometimes the game works well at first, but later it can break. Then you have to fix everything.”
At first, Daviau did not think legacy games would be very popular. He thought only a few people would like them. But many players, like Russell Chapman, loved the idea. He said it was a big step in game design. “It’s exciting to learn new games,” he said.
Another fan, Ben Hogg, said people liked the adventure in legacy games. He said, “At first, I was worried about changing the game, but Pandemic Legacy showed me it was okay. People want new experiences, like in movies or video games.”
Legacy games are inspired by video games and popular TV shows. Daviau wanted to be a TV writer but later became a game designer. He still loves telling stories. Matt Leacock, who created Pandemic, said making legacy games is like writing a book. “You need to know how it starts and how it ends,” he said.
Daviau is happy with his work but wants to see what others do with the idea. He thinks players will soon want something new. Colby Dauch, who works for the company that published SeaFall, believes legacy games are very important. “It changes how we think about board games,” he said.
**Questions:**
1. Who is Rob Daviau?
2. What type of games does he design?
3. What is the name of the new version of Risk that he created?
4. What do players do in Pandemic?
5. What is the setting of the game SeaFall?
6. Why do designers need testers for legacy games?
7. What did Russell Chapman think about legacy games?
8. What did Ben Hogg say about changing the game?
9. What did Matt Leacock compare making legacy games to?
10. What does Colby Dauch think about legacy games?

One night, an octopus named Inky escaped from his tank at the National Aquarium in New Zealand. He crawled across the floor and went into a small drain that led to the Pacific Ocean. This story was exciting and many people shared it online. 
People like to think that animals are like us. Octopuses are very smart. They can open jars, recognize faces, and even play. Some scientists believe that animals have many smart behaviors, like remembering the past and understanding others' feelings. 
In the past, people thought animals were smart. For example, in medieval Europe, animals could be put on trial for crimes. Charles Darwin, a famous scientist, said that humans and animals are different, but not in a big way. 
In the 20th century, many people thought animals were not very smart. They believed animals only acted based on rewards and punishments. This idea changed how people saw animals. During this time, humans also harmed animal homes and did not care about animal welfare. 
Now, Dr. Frans de Waal believes we are starting to understand that animals are smarter than we thought. He says that animals have their own special skills. For example, squirrels can remember where they hide their nuts, which is something we might forget. 
In her book, Sy Montgomery talks about octopuses. She says that if an octopus tested human intelligence, it might think we are not smart because we cannot change our skin color like they can. 
Dr. de Waal is not sure if Inky really found the drain to the ocean. He knows that stories about animals can help people see how smart they are. He did an experiment with monkeys to see if they feel envy. When some monkeys got cucumbers and others got grapes, the ones with cucumbers got very upset. A video of this experiment helped many people understand the findings. 
This shows how interesting and complex animal minds can be. 
**Questions:**
1. What is the name of the octopus that escaped?
2. Where did Inky escape from?
3. What can octopuses do that shows they are smart?
4. Who was Charles Darwin?
5. What did Dr. de Waal study about animals?
6. What happened in the experiment with the monkeys?

Robots are becoming very important in our world. They are not just in stories anymore; they are in factories and other places. Many experts say that robots will change how we work in many jobs. Some people think that robots will do most of the work that humans do in the next 50 years. However, many also believe their jobs will stay the same. This is not true. Robots will affect all types of jobs soon.
For example, a company in Australia called Fastbrick Robotics has made a robot named Hadrian X. This robot can lay 1,000 bricks in one hour. It would take two human workers a whole day to do the same job. Another robot, called Tally, helps in supermarkets. It checks if the shelves have enough products and if they are in the right place.
Some people say that robots cannot fix or program themselves yet. This means there will be new jobs for people who can work with robots. But others worry that we need to keep our human skills at work. They think that losing the human touch will be a big problem.
Dr. Jing Bing Zhang is an expert on robots. He studies how robots will change jobs in the future. He says that in two years, many robots will be smarter and work better with humans. In three years, many big companies will have a special person to manage robots. In five years, salaries in the robot industry will go up a lot, but there will still be many jobs that need skilled workers.
Zhang believes that people who have lower skills will be affected by robots. He says they should learn new skills instead of waiting for the government to help them. People cannot do the same job for their whole life anymore.
New technology will create new types of robots that we have not seen before. These robots will live with us in our homes and interact with us. This is a big chance for companies, but it also brings challenges. We need new rules to keep us safe and protect our privacy.
With many jobs at risk, it is important to focus on education. Countries need more students in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) to stay strong in the future. 
**Questions:**
1. What is the name of the robot that can lay bricks quickly?
2. What does the robot Tally do in supermarkets?
3. Who is Dr. Jing Bing Zhang?
4. What should lower-skilled workers do according to Zhang?
5. Why do countries need more STEM graduates?

George Mallory was a mountaineer. He was asked why he wanted to climb Mount Everest. He said, "Because it’s there." This answer shows that climbing can be about adventure and fun. 
A writer named Tejada-Flores wrote an important essay in 1967 called "Games that Climbers Play." He talked about seven different climbing activities, from playing on rocks to climbing big mountains. Each activity has its own rules. 
Many climbers love climbing because it makes them feel free. But sometimes, climbing can also feel very limiting. For example, being stuck in a tent during a storm is not very freeing. This shows that climbing can be both freeing and restricting.
Joe Fitschen, a US rock climber, wrote an essay where he asked, "Why do people climb?" He believes climbing is part of being human. We like to take on challenges, even if they are risky. 
Another writer, Brian Treanor, said that climbing can help us learn important values like courage and respect for nature. He thinks these values are important in our modern world.
Some expert climbers, Ebert and Robinson, believe that climbing alone is harder and deserves more recognition than climbing with a team or using extra help, like oxygen tanks. However, this idea can be dangerous for some climbers.
Climbing can also be about being in the moment and solving problems. Some people say that climbing is similar to Zen philosophy, which helps train the mind to find peace. This is another reason why people may be drawn to climbing.

Alfred Brendel is a famous pianist. He played classical music for over sixty years. He was very smart and serious. He played many important piano pieces and recorded them. He wrote a lot but did not teach many students. People who knew him saw that he could be fun, but he was usually serious in concerts. He studied, traveled, and performed a lot.
A few years ago, a young boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of Brendel’s concerts. He asked Brendel for piano lessons. At first, Brendel did not think this was a good idea. He had very few students and did not want to start teaching. He remembered a famous pianist who said, “You don’t ask a mountain guide to teach a child how to walk.” But when he listened to Kit play, he changed his mind. Kit was about 14 years old and played very well without looking at the music. He even gave Brendel a CD of his performance, which was beautiful. Brendel thought, “I must make time for him.”
Now, Kit is 19 years old. He is always busy learning new things like languages, math, computer code, and playing tennis. His mother is always with him. Kit also composes music. Brendel thinks this is important. He says that writing music helps you learn to read it better. He noticed that Kit has a great memory and can read music very well. Kit listens to his own playing and understands what Brendel teaches him.
Brendel is careful not to raise expectations for Kit. He does not like when newspapers call Kit the best pianist of the 21st century. He thinks this can be harmful. Young musicians can play some things very well, but they need time to improve in other areas. 
Now, at 80 years old, Brendel is more relaxed. He says that when he was young, he did not want to be famous quickly. He wanted to achieve certain things by the time he was 50. When he turned 50, he felt he had done most of those things but still wanted to do more. Even though he cannot play as much now, he still thinks about music and enjoys his new life.

When I was a child, I thought gardens were beautiful places. My grandad’s garden was by a river. It sloped down to the water. You could not go to the river, but you could hear the water and the birds in the trees. I thought all gardens were like this – a peaceful place. 
Grandad’s garden was simple. He did not have a big greenhouse like some of his neighbors. Their greenhouses were made from old window frames. They used plastic to cover broken glass. 
At home, my father was quiet. He was not serious all the time. He liked to say funny phrases. One of his favorites was, “It’s immaterial to me.” He could have just said, “I don’t mind,” but he liked the word “immaterial.” My father left school without any qualifications and became a plumber. He did not love plumbing. He was not very ambitious. He and my mother thought about moving to Canada, but it did not happen. 
My father was good at fixing things at home. He could build bookshelves and cupboards very well. My parents moved to a new house only once. But my mother liked to change the furniture a lot. Just when you got used to one chair, she would bring in another. The biggest change was when a piano came into the house. I wanted to like it, but it made me nervous. I liked the two brass candlesticks on it, but my mother said they were too fancy, and they disappeared while I was at school. I was not allowed to play the piano. My sister had lessons instead. When I asked my mother why I could not play, she said, “You’d never have practiced.”
I liked the river best when I could choose between the moors, woods, or river. I could imagine another world by the river. I would take a fishing net and wear old sandals. I would walk along the riverbank looking for a good place to take off my sandals. I wanted to catch fish with my net. But after trying to keep them alive in the yard, I had to put them back in the water.
I wanted to leave school quickly, but it seemed hard. One day, my father said, “There is a job for an apprentice gardener in the Parks Department. I thought you might like it.” In that moment, my father surprised me. He might have preferred if I became a carpenter. But I like to think he saw my love for gardening. Even if he did not like gardening himself, he noticed my passion for plants and flowers.

Lawrence MacEwen is on his Scottish island, the Isle of Muck. I am with him. The strong wind is very strong, and it feels like it could blow us off the cliff and into the ocean below. But Lawrence’s dog, Tie, comes close, and Lawrence pets him gently. The wind cannot make Lawrence uncomfortable. He is happy on his island.
Lawrence shows me around. He points to the north and shouts, “That island is Eigg. The one next to it is the Isle of Rum. It gets a lot of rain.” I see dark clouds over Rum. “Beyond Rum is the island of Soay.” 
Suddenly, Lawrence says, “I have sheep to move.” We walk down the hill. He tells me about the island: Muck is three kilometers long and one and a half kilometers wide. The geese eat a lot of grass. The MacEwen family has lived here for 3000 years. 
While moving the sheep, Tie, the dog, is not doing a good job. Lawrence says, “Away to me, Tie,” but Tie does not listen. Lawrence sounds disappointed. The Isle of Muck is mostly run by the MacEwen family. Lawrence and his wife, Jenny, run the farm. Their son Colin takes care of the island cottages, and their daughter Mary runs the island hotel with her husband, Toby. Mary and Toby like that their two boys can play outside and sail boats in the summer. “They go out and come back when they are hungry,” Mary says.
But life on the island is not easy. There is electricity only sometimes. One evening, I wait for the lights to turn on. The next morning, I see Mary making breakfast with a flashlight. I also have no mobile phone service. Mary tells me, “You can use your phone on the hill, but most people just put it away after a few days.” So I do too.
Everything on Muck is surprising. A boat comes with groceries and three musicians. They play music in the island’s tearoom, and everyone enjoys it. That night, by the warm fire, Lawrence tells me how he met Jenny. “Her father bought a small farm on Soay without seeing it. He had never been to Scotland. Jenny went to manage it.” Did Jenny know about farms? “She could type well.”
I go to bed with rain and wake up to more rain. I eat well because most of the food comes from the island. Mary sends me to fisherman Sandy Mathers for fresh fish. I bring it back to Mary. By 7 pm, we eat the fish, and it is very good.
The next morning, I worry about my ferry to the next island. Many ferries were canceled because of high waves. If my ferry does not come, I will stay on Muck for two more days. I secretly hope for that. 
**Questions:**
1. Where is Lawrence MacEwen?
2. What is the name of Lawrence's dog?
3. How long is the Isle of Muck?
4. Who runs the island hotel?
5. What do the boys do in the summer? 
6. What does Mary use to make breakfast when the lights are off?
7. What kind of food does the writer eat on the island?
8. What does the writer worry about in the morning?

The game design industry used to be for computer scientists and self-taught people. Many thought video games were just a hobby for young people. Now, the video game industry is taken seriously. It is not easy to get into this industry. Making video games that come out after movies needs many team members and a lot of skill and hard work. 
Jim Donelly, who works for an online games magazine, says, “It is hard to get a job in big companies. But the industry needs game designers now more than ever. They need not just the big directors but also the people who design parts of the game.” 
So, how can you start a career in this competitive field? Many companies want people with a degree in computer science, but Jim thinks differently. He says, “The best way is to make games. You need to show what you can do. Game design is not just a job; it is a way of life.” 
Another expert, John Field, agrees but adds, “It is not that simple. Many people want to work in games, but few have the skills needed today. You need to be creative and have technical knowledge.” 
Can you work alone? John says, “Maybe, but it is hard. A good course in games can help you. Most game designers start as programmers or artists and then move up. They love all kinds of entertainment and culture. They may have worked for a few years after school but know that games are their passion. They are not just fans; they are excited about the future of games.” 
Connections can also help you get ahead in the game industry. Many people forget this, but knowing others in the field is important. 
The idea of a young boy playing video games all the time is changing. Now, many adults play games too. Families often play together on consoles. Smartphones have many new games through apps and social media. John believes there is a lot of room for growth. “Games are popular with many people. They are also a fun way to learn, and I see many new opportunities in this area.”

"Since I was a child, I wanted to kick a football. My dad encouraged me to play. I am happy he did not force me. I had a friend whose dad was very strict. He always said, ‘You can’t do this, you can’t do that.’ My friend could have been a good player, but he stopped wanting to play football. I am glad I still love it. When I score a great goal, some people say it is luck, but it is not. I have practiced shooting from far away since I was a kid. You need to practice to score amazing goals. The best players practice a lot. Sometimes young players crash into each other, but I learned good skills. When I teach kids, I tell them to enjoy learning. I played many sports in school, like rounders, baseball, athletics, and basketball. I know school is important, but I only thought about football then. The teachers did a good job, but I did not see it. I do not want my son to be like that. We read him books, even if he is too young to sit still. I hope he does not just want to kick the books around. 
At the start of my football career, the manager helped young players like me to play for the first team. He did not make a big deal about it, but we knew it was important. I scored in the first game, but we lost. A TV presenter said, ‘You can’t win anything with kids.’ This made us work harder. We had doubts, but we believed in ourselves as a team. I depend on my close friends and family. Having money can cause problems. Some people say, ‘I can’t believe you let your mother work.’ I help my parents with money. I paid off their house and bought them a car for Christmas. My family is strong, and they do not want to be treated like they need help. My mum loves her job as a hairdresser, even if she does not earn much. I like to use my money to help my family. I have money, but it does not solve everything. After I stop playing, I want to take a break and do things I could not do before. I want to go skiing the day after I stop playing. I cannot do that now because if I break my leg, I cannot play football again."

Sam Carter helped us live at Reef Point. He was my father’s agent in Los Angeles. My father could not write anything in Los Angeles, so Sam wanted to find us a cheap place to live. 
In the summer, the beach was empty because of the sea fogs. Reef Point did not have many visitors. The road was not nice, and a better place, La Carmella, was nearby. People with money went there. Only those who had no money or loved surfing came to Reef Point. 
But now, with the hot weather, many people came to the beach. After being alone for months, we were now surrounded by people. My father was busy trying to write a script. I often went to the beach with a book and my dog, Rusty. 
When we first moved to Reef Point, we did not have a dog. Rusty came to us and did not leave. I tried to send him away, but he always came back. One day, I gave him some water. My father threw a boot at him, but he did not really want to hurt him. Rusty came closer. I asked my father, “Who does he belong to?” My father said, “He thinks we belong to him.” 
Rusty loved the beach. He liked to dig and bring things to me. Sometimes he found things that were not his, like a sneaker or a beach towel. I had to give these back to their owners. Rusty liked to swim with me, even though I could swim faster. 
That day, my father went to Los Angeles to deliver his script. Rusty and I played in the sea all afternoon. As the sun set, it got cooler, and we watched the surfers. They had been surfing all day. One surfer was very good. She rode a wave and then came to the shore. 
“Hi,” she said. “Why didn’t you join us?” 
“I don’t have a surfboard.” 
“You could get one.” 
“I have no money.” 
“You’re British, right? Are you visiting?” 
“No, I live here.” 
“Is your father American?” 
“No. He came here to write a film script of a novel he wrote.” 
“Really? What’s his name?” 
“Rufus Marsh.” 
“Do you mean, Tall as the Morning?” 
I nodded. 
“I read that book!” She looked at me with interest. I thought it was nice when people were friendly and interested in my father’s book.

Violet Hetherington was in a long line at the dock in Southampton. She was waiting to get on the Queen Caroline ship. Her friend Annie had told her, “It is better to arrive late.” But now, Violet was not happy. There was a problem with the computer system, and no one was moving. The people in line were getting upset. They had paid a lot of money for this trip, and they wanted to enjoy it.
Violet felt worried. She looked in her bag for her phone, but it was not there. This made her more upset. She could not call the taxi company to see if she left her phone in the taxi because all the phone numbers were in her phone. 
Behind her, a nice couple stood in line. Violet asked them, “Can I use your phone to make a call? I think I left my phone behind.” She called her son Harry and left a message. She asked him to tell her neighbor, Kristina, to check if her phone was at home. If it was not there, she would have a problem because she needed her phone in New York.
Finally, the line moved, and Violet gave her travel documents to the worker. When she got inside the ship, it looked like a fancy hotel, but not a very nice one. There were shiny decorations and big lights. She followed the signs to the elevators, which were full of tired passengers. 
When the elevator stopped at the twelfth floor, Violet got out. She was happy to see that her room had a balcony, just like she wanted. She had paid a lot of money for this room because she wanted to enjoy her trip at sea.

John Maloof bought a box of old photo negatives at an auction. He wanted pictures for a book about Portage Park, a neighborhood in Chicago, USA. Instead, he found 30,000 photos by Vivian Maier, a street photographer. Maloof has collected many things from Maier’s life, including her cameras, 2,000 rolls of film, 3,000 prints, and 100,000 negatives. He also has 8mm movies and audiotapes.
One morning, Maloof looked at everything he had. He felt lucky. He said, “When I bought all this, I had no idea what it was.” Maloof is a flea market seller and could have sold everything to someone else.
Maloof and his friend Anthony Rydzon are learning about Maier’s life. They talked to families that hired her as a nanny and to people who developed her film. Maier was born in 1926 in New York and spent much of her childhood in France. In 1951, she returned to New York and in 1956 moved to Chicago to work as a nanny. Maier was a private person and always had a camera. She wore big coats, wide hats, and sturdy shoes. 
Maren Baylaender, whose husband hired Maier, said, “On her day off, the camera was around her neck, and we wouldn’t see her until late at night.” Maier had strong opinions about movies and politics. She knew a lot about theater and movies. Even though she was not very social, she walked the streets with her camera and talked to people. 
Rydzon said, “She was a true artist and followed her dreams.” Maier’s work is real art; she did not do it for money. Her photos show women, children, the old, the poor, and abstract scenes. Photography expert Larry Silverman said, “Vivian has many interesting pictures.” He wonders if she created her own style or learned from other photographers.
Maloof often thinks about the negatives he has stored in three fireproof cabinets. He did not care about photography until he found Maier’s work. Inspired by her photos, he started taking pictures himself. He said, “I realized that the people and street scenes were more important than I thought. I was sitting on something more important than I ever imagined. Now our goal is to share Vivian Maier’s name and get her into the history books.”

When a book is called ambitious, it often means it did not succeed completely. But this is not true for Eleanor Catton’s book, The Luminaries. I talked to her in the UK when her book was very popular. She was calm, even though she was still in her twenties. She had just come from Germany and was going back to New Zealand the next day. 
Eleanor told me a story about being stopped at passport control. The officer asked her to prove she was a writer. She showed her book through the glass. The officer looked at it and asked, “What is it about?” This is not an easy question for a writer. 
The Luminaries takes place in New Zealand in the 1860s. There are many crimes, and twelve men come together to solve them. The story is very complex. Eleanor wanted to write a murder mystery, not a historical book, but she found that the past gave her many ideas for her characters. The book is more than 800 pages long because she wanted to give each of the 20 main characters a good story.
When I asked her how it feels to be successful at a young age, she said it feels nice. She feels that people from her small country share in her success. She also said it is annoying when people think her book is not serious. 
Eleanor wanted to write the book in a spiral shape. Each part is half the length of the part before it. The story gets faster as it goes on. I asked her if it matters if readers notice this. She said she wanted to create patterns in the book that readers could see if they wanted to.
Even with its unique structure, The Luminaries is an exciting murder mystery. Surprisingly, Eleanor did not know how the story would end before she wrote it. She would write herself into a difficult situation and then find a way out. She wanted to make the book fun for readers.
We also talked about her love for TV dramas. I asked if she would like to write for TV. She said, “That could be pretty cool.” She was very excited when she talked about her writing and New Zealand. 
Eleanor said that when she comes to Britain, her imagination changes because of the different landscape. She understands why writers leave New Zealand for busy places with many people. But for now, New Zealand will still be her home. I hope it gives her inspiration for many more books.

When Jonny Kinkead was a boy, he liked to make things in his dad’s garage and play the guitar. For the last forty years, he has built acoustic guitars by hand. Jonny loves the guitar. He wonders how two pieces of wood can make a beautiful sound. He learned to play his brother’s guitar when he was eleven. At sixteen, he wanted a bass guitar. Instead of saving money, he decided to make one himself. He studied how different shapes and types of wood change the sound of the guitar.
Jonny built his first bass guitar, but he did not think about making guitars as a job. He also liked painting and sculpture. After school, he studied architecture because he liked design. But halfway through, he left school. He realized that building guitars was like making sculpture, but with sound. He thought it was a good job because people use the guitars he makes.
Jonny has made guitars for a living since then. For the first ten years, he cleaned windows to earn extra money. At first, he sold his guitars for the cost of materials. As he became known as a good guitar maker, he could charge more money. Even now, after almost forty years, he says he is still just getting by. He can only make about ten guitars a year, which limits his income.
In the beginning, Jonny worked hard to get known. He went to music festivals and let musicians try his guitars. He also learned how to price his guitars because he did not know how to do this at first. Jonny thinks it is easier for new guitar makers today. When he started, many people thought only American guitars were good. Now, UK-made guitars are respected.
Jonny believes new guitar makers should take classes to learn important skills. However, he also thinks that learning by trying and making mistakes is very important. He says it is good to look at other instruments and see what works and what does not. If you make the back of a guitar too thin or too thick, it will not sound good. If you learn from someone else, you may only learn one way. But if you teach yourself, like Jonny did, you can learn many things.

When people talk in English, they often start with the weather. A famous writer, Dr. Johnson, said, "When two English people meet, they first talk about the weather." This is still true today. Many people wonder why English people talk about the weather so much. They think it is because English people really like the weather. 
An American writer, Bill Bryson, says that English weather is not very interesting. He points out that in England, there are no big storms like tornadoes or monsoons. However, a British broadcaster, Jeremy Paxman, disagrees. He believes that English weather is interesting because it is always changing. He says that in England, you can never be sure what the weather will be like.
I think both Bryson and Paxman miss the real reason why English people talk about the weather. When they say things like, "Nice day, isn’t it?" or "Ooh, isn’t it cold?" they are not really asking about the weather. These phrases are ways to start a conversation or fill a pause. 
Talking about the weather is like a special way for English people to connect with each other. There are three main times when they use weather talk: as a greeting, to start a conversation, or when there is a quiet moment. This is why it seems like English people talk about the weather all the time. They might start with a weather greeting, then talk a little more about the weather, and go back to it if there is a pause in the conversation. This is why many people think English people are obsessed with the weather.

'Alice Leader was standing in front of Hadrian’s Wall in Britain. She was with her class of 12- and 13-year-olds. She wanted to explain how amazing it was that the Romans built a wall that is 120 km long and 5 metres high about 1900 years ago. The students were excited about this trip. They chose it instead of going to Spain, Greece, or France. But they wanted to know why the wall was built. Alice felt she did not have good answers. She could not find a good book about the history of the wall, so she decided to write one herself. 
Alice stopped teaching after 31 years and started to write books in 2001. She felt nervous but excited about this new job. She said, “Teaching is like acting. It is hard work. Writing is exciting, but it is not so tiring.” Alice wanted to write books for children. She noticed that many books for young people are about sad things or are just fantasy, like Harry Potter. She wanted her books to be different.
Alice always taught English and History together. She loved to see when children went from being bored to being interested. She thought it was her job to make learning fun. She started to write her first book because she saw a need for it. Her two sons were leaving home, and her head teacher suggested she take a writing course. At first, Alice did not want to go to the course. 
Before the course, she had to send a story to the teachers. She quickly wrote a story about a Roman couple and their baby. After three hours, she had 30 pages and sent it in. She was accepted into the course. The other students liked her story and told her to publish it. 
Alice asked her school head teacher for a year off to write her first book. Her husband, Zachary Leader, helped her by editing her work. Alice said, “My mother-in-law thinks we are rivals, but I think we help each other. He changes my sentences and suggests new words. I like to add more scenes.”'

To raise money for charity, a newspaper and a TV company asked brothers Jonny and Alistair Brownlee, who are champion triathletes, to join a special race. This race was between a man and a car, and also between the two brothers. In the beautiful and hilly Yorkshire Dales in northern England, Jonny would drive a car on the roads, and Alistair would ride a mountain bike across the hills. 
“I’m excited!” Jonny said at the start line. “I have never done this before. The views are beautiful, and it is very cold, so I can stay warm in the car.” Alistair was also excited, but he wore warm cycling clothes. “I have seen Jonny drive before,” he said. “I am not sure he will make it. I might stop for tea on the way.”
The race started at Semerwater lake and would finish at Fleet Moss, which is very high up. The car would have no problem, but Alistair had to ride up a steep hill first. They quickly shook hands and started the race. Alistair rode fast on his bike, while Jonny drove the car.
Just 15 seconds into the drive, Jonny had a problem. A big tractor came out of a field and blocked the road. “Welcome to Yorkshire,” he said to the cameraman. “If Alistair beats me, it’s because of this farmer!” After the tractor was gone, Jonny drove on. 
Alistair was having a hard time. He had to get off his bike and carry it up the hill. Some sheep watched him as he walked with the bike on his shoulders. Finally, he reached the top of the hill. The sun came out, and he started to ride fast again.
In the car, Jonny faced another problem. The roads in Yorkshire are old and narrow. He had to drive slowly around a tight corner and through a small stream on the road. After that, he could drive fast to the finish line. 
Neither brother knew who was ahead. Jonny drove quickly to Fleet Moss, while Alistair rode hard on the last part of his race. When Alistair reached the finish line, he looked around and asked, “Is he here?” When he found out Jonny was not there yet, he raised his arms and shouted, “Yes!”
A few minutes later, Jonny arrived in the car. “Well done,” he said to Alistair, feeling sad. “I’m upset.” 
**Questions:**
1. Who are the two brothers in the race?
2. What does Jonny drive in the race?
3. What does Alistair ride in the race?
4. Where does the race start?
5. What problem does Jonny have while driving?
6. What does Alistair do when he has trouble riding up the hill?
7. How does Alistair feel when he finishes the race?

The silence is what you notice when you play on Centre Court at Wimbledon. You bounce the ball quietly on the soft grass. You toss it up to serve and hit it, hearing the echo of your shot. The nice grass, the history, the old stadium, the players in white, and the respectful crowds all make you feel safe and calm. The quiet helps my game. In a tennis match, I try to focus only on the game and the point I am playing. 
When a point ends, the silence breaks with noise: applause, cheers, and people shouting my name. I hear them, but it feels far away. I do not think about the fifteen thousand people watching me. I am very focused and do not realize that millions are watching me play Roger Federer in the 2008 Wimbledon final – the biggest match of my life. I always dreamed of playing at Wimbledon. My uncle Toni, my coach, told me from a young age that this was the biggest tournament. When I was 14, I shared my dream with friends that I would play there one day and win.
Before 2008, I played and lost to Federer two times in the finals. The loss in 2006 was not so hard. I was happy to be there at twenty years old. Federer won easily. But my loss in 2007 was very hard. I knew I could have played better. I cried for half an hour in the dressing room. Losing hurts, but it hurts more when you have a chance to win and lose. Toni, my tough coach, usually does not comfort me, but after that loss, he told me not to cry and that there would be more chances to play at Wimbledon. I told him he did not understand; I thought it was my last chance to win. 
I know that a professional athlete's career is short, and I want to make the best of it. Every moment is important, but some moments are more important than others. I let a big chance pass in 2007. Toni could not help my sadness. But he was right. Another chance came in 2008, just one year later. I was confident I had learned from my loss. I believed I would win this time. 
The night before the final, at dinner with family and friends, we did not talk about the match. I did not tell them to stop, but they understood that I was already thinking about the match in my head. From then until the match started, that space in my mind was mine alone.

'A young English woman came to Africa in April 1957. In her first letter home, she wrote, “I am living in the Africa I have always wanted.” Her name was Jane Goodall. She spent most of her life in Africa as a citizen, journalist, scientist, and activist. In 1963, Jane became famous because of articles and TV shows about her work with chimpanzees. She wrote many books, including children’s books and the popular book In the Shadow of Man, which has been translated into 47 languages. Jane Goodall is one of the most famous female scientists of the 20th century. 
Many stories have been told about her life, but they often focus on her as a girl who loved adventure or a woman who wanted to work with animals. These stories do not show all her real achievements. Jane Goodall is a very important scientist. She helped us understand how chimpanzees live and feel. Before her work, people thought chimpanzees were very dangerous. No one knew that chimpanzees ate meat or used tools. We did not know that they have feelings like humans or that they have social groups like ours. 
Jane Goodall wrote a book called The Chimpanzees of Gombe in 1986. This book is very important for chimpanzee research. Her study of chimpanzees in Gombe State, Nigeria, is one of the great scientific achievements. Jane Goodall changed how we study animals and how we think about ourselves as humans. 
Even as a child, Jane showed signs of being a biologist. When she was five years old, she disappeared one day. The police and her family looked for her. After a long search, she came back with straw in her hair. Her mother asked where she had been. Jane said she wanted to know how hens lay eggs. To find out, she hid in a henhouse for five hours until a hen laid an egg. This story shows the beginning of her love for animals.'

In our first talk, Shirley Ford uses many funny voices. She sounds like a cheeky 8-year-old boy, a tired mother, an old Scottish woman, and a fast-talking alien. People who watch children’s TV and cartoons know her voices. Shirley says, “I just did a voiceover about back injuries. I had to learn many medical words quickly.” 
Shirley talks about voiceovers. She says, “Many actors think they can do funny voices, and some can. But it is not just that. You must make the script exciting for people who cannot see you.” Many famous people want to do voiceovers. Producers invite them to try out, but they often do not get the job because they are used to acting with their whole bodies.
After school, Shirley took a drama course. She wanted to be an actor. Sometimes, she sang jingles for TV ads. One day, the man at the recording studio asked her to try for the part of a rabbit in a cartoon. She thought it was silly but tried it for fun and got the part. Shirley found out she could do voices and wanted to do voiceover work. 
In her second film, she played the main character and also her brother and mother. Women actors often do the voices for small boys and girls because their voices are lighter. It is hard to find child actors, so production companies prefer to use adult women. 
Shirley learned to make different sounds and to not always sound the same. She watches children’s TV to find new voices. She enjoys working on cartoons the most. “Sometimes, I have to sound excited about things I don’t care about, but my experience helps,” she says. “I learned to smile while talking. It makes my voice sound happy.” 
The competition for voiceover work is tough. A good showreel, which shows what an artist can do, is very important. Shirley says, “It is worth making a strong showreel. There are agencies that help voiceover artists with this.” She believes she is successful because she works hard and has talent. 
For people who want to do voiceovers, Shirley suggests going to special workshops. She thinks it is important to love voices. She says, “If I do an American voice in the studio, I might talk like that for hours or days after.” Her children are used to her talking in different voices.

People often ask me how I became a cartoonist. This is normal because many kids dream of being cartoonists, like they dream of being race car drivers. But most people stop dreaming and choose other jobs, like being a lawyer or making car parts. It seems silly to think you can make money by drawing funny pictures. But some people do it.
Not everyone becomes a cartoonist in the same way. Most cartoonists have wanted to do this for a long time. I loved comic strips as a kid, drew for my school, and was known as "the kid who draws." I studied graphic design in college. After I finished school, I showed my drawings to different companies. I was lucky to find a newspaper that wanted political cartoons. I drew some ideas, and they bought them. Soon, I was making enough money to live.
You don’t need much to be a cartoonist. You don’t need a college degree or a lot of money. You just need your brain, your hand, and something to draw with. But if it was that easy, there would be many more cartoonists. It is not an easy job. It is better to have a regular job that pays well and gives you time for family and hobbies.
The more skills you have, the better chance you have to make a living with your art. I have done political cartoons, comic strips, and comic books. I have also written, drawn caricatures, and designed. I take any job because you can learn a lot from work you don’t want to do. It helps to be smart and curious about the world.
What about the business side of being a cartoonist? In the past, many cartoonists had regular jobs with newspapers and magazines. Now, most cartoonists have to sell their own work. If you are good at selling, you will do better. I have seen cartoonists who are not very creative but are good at business do better than very talented artists who do not know how to sell.
Some people worry too much about others stealing their ideas. They are so scared that they won’t even show their work to anyone! To protect your work, you just need to draw a small ‘c’ for ‘copyright,’ put a circle around it, and write your name and the date. But really, it is more likely that no one will care about your work. If someone does take your cartoon and it becomes popular online, it is not a disaster – it can be a lucky chance!

Twenty years ago, I was moving to a new house and cleaning out my things. I decided to throw away an electric guitar that my dad gave me for my 16th birthday. It was a nice, black guitar from Japan. I usually do not like to throw things away, so I felt bad about this. I took it to the dump and was going to put it in the trash when a young man came up to me. He looked confused and said, “You’re not going to throw that away, are you?” I told him I was, and he asked if he could have it. I said “Yes,” and we went our separate ways.
After that day, I felt sad about giving away my guitar. A few months ago, I opened an email that changed everything. I remembered a story about a man who lost his wedding ring in the ocean. Ten years later, he found it in a fish he was eating. That’s how I felt when I read the email from a man named Keith Rushton. He said, “I have your electric guitar.” 
The guitar had been sold many times since I gave it away. Keith found my name on a label on the guitar. He used my name to find me online. He contacted me through the newspaper I work for and wanted to sell it back to me. I was very happy. I would have given him anything for it, but his price was fair. I remembered how my dad liked to put name labels on my things, even my guitar.
My parents wanted me to learn classical guitar because it was popular in the 1970s. I loved the sound of it; it was calm and gentle. But I did not get better at it, so I switched to electric guitar and played easy songs. At that time, punk music was also popular, and anyone could be a rock star, even if they could not play well.
When I opened the box with my old guitar, I remembered my birthday in 1978 when my parents gave it to me. Holding the guitar again felt smooth and nice. I sat down to play, but then I wanted to stand up and put a strap on my shoulder because electric guitars are played while standing. My fingers remembered where to go. I could not draw the chords, but my hands knew how to play. My fingers felt a little pain from pressing the strings.
The electric guitar is not usually played alone. Now that I am learning it again, I think I should start a band. My son is learning the saxophone; maybe we can play together. Or maybe I can find other people my age who want to play. We could call ourselves “The Regainers!”

There has been a lot of talk about sleep recently. I wrote a book called Insomniac about people who cannot sleep. I wanted to tell people about the dangers of not getting enough sleep. Sleep is very important for our minds, bodies, and feelings. People who have trouble sleeping know how important sleep is. It is good that people are talking about sleep now. 
But what about dreams? I do not hear much about dreams. We lose dreams all the time. When you wake up early because of an alarm, you miss the last hour or two of sleep. This lost sleep is mostly REM sleep, which is when we dream a lot. Our best and most memorable dreams happen in REM sleep just before we wake up. A good sleeper spends about a quarter of their sleep time in REM. If a person lives for 90 years, they will spend six or seven years in REM sleep. 
When researchers take away REM sleep from people, they dream more the next night. This shows that dreams are important. In 1953, researchers found REM sleep. Many people agreed with psychologist Sigmund Freud, who said that dreams help us understand our minds. But later studies showed that this was not so simple. Now, researchers focus more on the physical reasons for dreams rather than the psychological ones. 
Robert Stickgold, a sleep scientist at Harvard University, says that researchers do not agree on many things about dreams. Dreams are important. At a meeting of sleep experts, P.F. Pagel from the University of Colorado Medical School talked about a study. This study found that actors, writers, and directors remember and use their dreams better than other people. Pagel thinks that people who are creative use their dreams more. 
Stickgold says that dreams help us think in new ways. They help us connect ideas from the past and present. For example, when people are woken from REM sleep and asked to think of a word, their answers are more original than when they wake from other sleep stages. They think of surprising ideas. Stickgold says this is creativity. 
I also write better when I wake up from strong dreams. Even a bad dream can help me think better. On those days, my ideas come out quickly. I do not know how it works, but it does help. Creativity is not just for writers or artists. We all need to think well in our complex world. We need to dream to help us think creatively and solve problems with others.

'Twenty years ago, Susie Ray left London to live in a small town by the sea in south-west England. When you enter her studio, you see empty frames on the walls and happy pictures of her two daughters. Susie is a copyist artist. She can copy famous paintings very well. “I don’t keep my own paintings,” Susie says. “As soon as I finish them, I sell them.” Many people want her work. In her 30 years as a copyist, she has painted many famous artists’ works, like Renoir, Monet, and Van Gogh. Her copies look so real that experts sometimes think they are the originals. The real paintings can sell for millions of pounds, but her copies sell for a few hundred pounds to £12,000, depending on how long she works on them. Susie does not tell many names of her clients, but they include galleries and private collectors. Some collectors want to show off their art. One famous buyer likes to say he has a ‘Van Gogh’ painting, but it is really a ‘Susie Ray Van Gogh’. “Many famous people say my copies are originals,” she says. “That is their choice.” Some collectors keep the original painting in a safe place and show Susie’s copy at home. Susie is honest about her work. When she copies a painting, she tries to make it look very real. She believes it is important to respect the original artist. She puts her name on the back of the canvas. It is illegal to sell a copy as the real painting, and even though some people do this, Susie does not want to. She knows that people who make fake art can get into trouble. Susie is not rich, but she is more secure now. She does not want to risk her good name with collectors and artists.
